messages.title: Thank You
messages.content: Canterbury & Whitstable Liberal Democrats are saying a huge THANK YOU to local people for their support in the KCC elections on May 4th.

messages.title: A Record of Campaigning for Our Area
messages.content: James Flanagan is again seeking your support to become your MP on June 8th. With an outstanding record of campaigning on behalf of local people, he would serve you well in Parliament.

messages.title: Who isn’t standing up for our local NHS?
messages.content: Liberal Democrats have exposed the bosses of the hospital trust for hiding true figures on bed closures at Canterbury Hospital.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We welcome new housing, but it must be done carefully and with proper consultation to avoid mistakes of the past.
The Liberal Democrats exposed the bosses of the hospital trust for hiding true figures on bed closures at Canterbury Hospital.

mentions.candidate: James Flanagan was born and raised locally, and he read Economics at University. He lives with his young family in Whitstable.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dem General Election candidate has the best chance to unseat the Conservative MP elected in 2010 with a small majority.

issues.health: Liberal Democrats have exposed the bosses of the hospital trust for hiding true figures on bed closures at Canterbury Hospital.

community.content: Supporting the provision of more local low-cost housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: James Flanagan is again seeking your support to become your MP on June 8th. With an outstanding record of campaigning on behalf of local people, he would serve you well in Parliament.

endorsements.endorsement: James Flanagan has a proven record as the real community activist. Earned the respect of residents.

quotes.text: Lab Dem General Election candidate has the best chance of unseating the Conservative MP.

images.caption: James Flanagan campaigning with local supporters.
